name: A Sinister Secret
description:
• Experience an Adventure Game
    Experience a puzzle filled game, as you attempt to find out who was the one that killed your best friend.

  • A Noir like setting
    a dark and gray world, that will immerse the players in the dark tone.

  • Action elements
    hand to hand combat that was inspired by the godfather game.

  • 1950s setting
    the game is set in 1950s new york, and the after effects of the holocaust on its victims.

  • An episodic game
    the game is episodic in nature, and will feature 5 episodes.

  • Experience the trauma of a holocaust survivor 

    the main character is a Polish Jew immigrated to America, by an american family that adopted him. shortly after he watched his family die in the camps.
